input_text.Prompt:
Generate a product description using the following product title and specifications.

Product title:
Officially LIcensed by the NFL - Dallas Cowboys Dog Football Jersey - X-Large

Product specifications:
-Officially Licensed by the NFL - Dallas Cowboys Dog Jersey
-Constructed of Breathable Micro-Mesh Polyester
-Features Official Team Number Font and Embroidered Logo on Sleeve
-Stylish V-Neck Cut Allows for a Comfortable Fit
-Decorated in the USA
input_text.Response A: Show support for your favorite team with this officially licensed NFL Pet Jersey from Sports Fan-Attic. This durable pet jersey is decorated in team colors and designed with the Dallas Cowboys team name and logo. Features: -Durable pet jersey is decorated in team colors and designed with the Dallas Cowboys team name and logo. -Constructed of breathable micro-mesh polyester and features official team number font and embroidered logo on sleeve. -Stylish v-neck cut allows for a comfortable fit. -Team Name: Dallas Cowboys -Team Logo: Dallas Cowboys -Number: None -Color: Blue/White -Material: 100% Polyester Micro Mesh - decoration is applied in the USA
input_text.Response B: Get ready to show off your love for Walther Waffen PPK P22 Pistole firearms with these high-quality embroidered iron-on cotton patches! Perfect for adding a touch of style to your clothing, bags, or accessories, these patches are made with high-quality materials and features strong, bright colors. With a headbonding glue surface on the back side, these patches are easy to iron on to cotton material. However, for leather or synthetic fabric, stitching is required. Each patch is perfectly chained, ensuring a professional and durable finish. And with free shipping from Thailand, you can buy with confidence knowing that you'll receive a product that's 100% customer satisfaction guaranteed. So, what are you waiting for? Add these patches to your collection today!

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.
